articles.title: TCL P725 4K HDR LED TV Series With Android TV 11, Ocarina Smart AC Launched in India: Price, Specificatio... - Gadgets 360
articles.description: TCL has launched the P725 4K HDR LED TV series in India, priced at Rs. 41,990 onwards. The new televisions come with Android TV 11, and support for Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos.
